MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.MenuItemName: Wild Hedgerow, Gin and Tonic | 12 Cans, £3.89 each
MenuItems.Description:
Trips along Hackney’s canal paths, picking wild herbs and flowers from the hedgerows, have inspired this beautiful riff on the classic G&T.

Botanical extracts of Chamomile, Woodruff, Hawthorn Berry and Lemon Verbena find their way into our mixing pot when we’re making our house tonic #3 which we match with East London Liquor’s Dry Gin for the perfect blend. 5.2% ABV
MenuItems.ImageUrl: longflintdrinksco/menus/Wild Hedgerow, Gin and Tonic | 12 Cans-51209.jpg

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.Description: If you could wrap summer up and stuff it in a can you’d be pretty happy with yourself, right? By making our own soda from vibrant rhubarb juice, a touch of cloudy apple, a minimal amount of sugar and adding our vote for the world’s finest grain-to-glass vodka from TOAD, we reckon we’ve done just that! 4.6% ABV

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.MenuItemName: Ginger Beer & Spiced Rum | 12 Cans, £3.89 each
MenuItems.Description: You know those ginger drinks you buy down the shops? Not real ginger. Here you’ll find pure pressed ginger juice & a drop of our homemade chilli tincture for a nice spot of heat. We then combine the lot with wonderful Rumbullion!®* spiced rum for what some call the best ginger drink they’ve ever tried. 5.6% ABV
MenuItems.ImageUrl: longflintdrinksco/menus/Ginger Beer & Spiced Rum | 12 Cans, £3.89 each-51211.jpg

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.Description:
Have you tasted real rhubarb in a drink before? I mean *really* tasted it? Our Rhubarb & Vodka Seltzer has so much pressed juice in it that sometimes a little bit escapes and makes a break for freedom! But seriously though, there is a lot. And we also squeeze in a bit of our vanilla tincture we make by macerating Madagascan vanilla pods in overproof vodka for three days, just to balance out the tartness of the rhubarb. 

With wonderfully soft organic vodka from our friends Sacred up the road in Highgate, it’s a bit like a  Smiths reunion packed full of hits - a real crowd pleaser... 4.6% ABV

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.MenuItemName: Rose Hip, Gin & Tonic | 24 Bottles, £4.10 each
MenuItems.Description:
We love a G&T but what we love more than anything is breaking apart well-loved recipes and rebuilding them in our own image. When we heard that the London Distillery Co. were making a gin in collaboration with the botanists at Kew Gardens we knew we wanted a slice of that pie.

So we came up with the Rose Hip, Organic Gin & Tonic featuring a beautiful simple syrup packed full of extracts from the Rosa Canina plant (or dog rose). The dog rose is one of the toughest plants found on London’s mean streets - you’ll see it bursting through brick walls and punching up alongside the overground revealing its red fruit as summer turns to autumn. It gives our first G&T out of the blocks a lovely citrus finish and a beautiful copper glow. 5.6% ABV

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.Description:
We pack loads of real pressed ginger juice into our Ginger and Rum Fuego and use a macerated chilli tincture we make with overproof vodka and Kashmiri chillies to add a little length to the natural heat. 

Once ready, we combine the lot with a shot-and-a-half of Rumbullion! spiced rum for what some call the best ginger drink they’ve ever tried.  5.6% ABV

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.MenuItemName: Grapefruit, Sour Cherry & Mezcal Paloma | 24 Bottles, £4.10 each
MenuItems.Description:
Mezcal, the smoky sister of tequila adds lovely complex notes to our riff on the Paloma.  We recently took a trip out to Oaxaca to see exactly how this bold spirit is made and fell even deeper in love. 

By using a really high-quality cold-pressed grapefruit juice, the best Mezcal from QuiQuiRiQui and adding our own sour cherry and fresh thyme macerate, we’ve created our boldest drink that lovers of big flavours die for. If you’re looking for something a little different, this is the place to start. 5% ABV
MenuItems.ImageUrl: longflintdrinksco/menus/Grapefruit, Sour Cherry & Mezcal Paloma | 24 Bottles-51215.jpg

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.Description:
Sometimes it feels like the classic Negroni has taken over the world. White  Negronis, Coffee Negronis, The Pink and The Amber - there’s a heap of styles out there.

Not to feel left out, we launched our version of the Negroni Sbagliato, made it longer with some orange juice and used Sacred’s Rose Hip Cup amaro as opposed to Campari for a more natural, slightly woodier take. Being 5.2% ABV we also call it a Session Negroni - you know, just for fun.  5.2% ABV

MenuItems.Notes: When ordering alcohol please be prepared to provide a valid ID upon delivery.
MenuItems.Description:
We cold brew whole hibiscus flower heads to make our own unique ruby-red tonic water.

We match the result with East London Liquor's London Dry Gin to make a fabulous spin on the classic G&T that's packed full of plum and greengage flavours. 5.2% ABV

Description: Made with the finest craft spirits
Notes:
Longﬂint were born from the East London brewing scene with the goal of producing the ﬁnest premium ready-to-serve cocktails made with our pick of the best craft gin, rum and vodka. From our Hibiscus Flower, Gin Tonic to our beautiful Sparkling Rhubarb and Vodka Seltzer, our drinks are made by hand using 100% natural ingredients.

The perfect serve for your next team event!

*Order by 2pm for next day delivery*
